MB.ActorNotInEncounter: This actor isn't part of the current combat encounter
MB.AdditionalAbilitiesHint: Comma separated list of abilities, e.g 'Knowledge,Magic,Sword'
MB.AttackCritText: Crit: x2 damage, target armor reduced one tier.
MB.AttackFumbleText: Fumble: Weapon breaks or is lost.
MB.CarryingRule: STR+8 carried items or DR+2 on AGI/STR tests.
MB.DefendFumbleText: Fumble: Take x2 damage, armor reduced one tier.
MB.EditAllowedScvmClassesMenuHint: Edit the allowed classes in the character generator.
MB.HPCalcModifier: Standard Mörk Borg: Toughness Modifier + HP Roll
MB.HPCalcRaw: Easy Mode: Toughness Roll Raw + HP Roll
MB.ItemDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the container and all the items?
MB.Name: Name
MB.OmensHelpText: Max damage, re-roll, -d6 damage, DR -4, no crit/fumble
MB.RestDialogEat: Eat - Restore stats as above, deduct food or drink.
MB.RestDialogInfected: Infected - Restore no stats, lose d6 HP per day.
MB.RestDialogLengthLong: Long - Full night's sleep. Restore d6 HP, regain Omens if depleted, regain PRE+d4 Power uses for the day.
MB.RestDialogLengthShort: Short - Catch your breath, have a drink. Restore d4 HP.
MB.RestDialogStarve: Starve - 2+ days without food or drink. Restore no stats, lose d4 HP/day.
MB.ScvmfactoryWarning: Destroy this character, and replace it with a new Scvm? WARNING: This cannot be undone!
MB.SettingsApplyOvercapacityPenaltyHint: +2 STR/AGI DR when carrying more than STR+8 items
MB.SettingsDeleteZeroQuantityHint: Automatically delete items when quantity decremented to zero
MB.SettingsColorSchemeHint: Choose a color scheme for the UI.
MB.SettingsFontSchemeHint: Choose a font scheme for the UI.
MB.SettingsHitAutomationHint: Enable auto-resolution of hits, misses, and damage rolls.
MB.SettingsMiseryTrackerAnimationsHint: Show animations on the Misery Tracker sheet?
MB.SettingsWhiteOnBlackPink: Mörk Borg Alt - White on black (pink)
MB.SettingsWhiteOnBlackWhite: Mörk Borg Alt - White on black (white)
MB.SettingsWhiteOnBlackYellow: Mörk Borg Standard - White on black (yellow)
MB.SettingsWhiteOnPinkWhite: Mörk Borg Alt - White on pink (white)
MB.SettingsTrackAmmoHint: Select and autodecrement ammo for ranged weapons.
MB.SeventhMiseryWillAlwaysBe: The seventh misery will always be 7:7
MB.SeventhSealIsBroken: The seventh seal is broken for the seventh and final time. The game and your lives end here.
MB.ShieldUseText: -1 damage, or break to ignore one attack
MB.Title: CRYS BORG
MB.WhenWillAllThisAgonyEnd: When will all this agony end?
MB.WieldAPowerDizzy: become dizzy for an hour and cannot use Powers during that time
MB.WieldAPowerText: PRE+d4 times per day. PRE DR12 to wield or -d2 HP and no Powers for 1 hr.
MB.SettingsBrokenButtonHint: If disabled, lets Players roll on Drop Check and Death Check (Frontier Scum) instead of the Broken Table.
MB.HPZeroMessage1: The blow has fallen and the marrow quakes; measure the ruin within your bones.
MB.HPZeroMessage2: Struck low by fate’s rotting hand, you must now reckon: was the hurt enough to end you?
MB.HPZeroMessage3: The dust of your body stirs in the black wind; do you crumble fully, or merely sag and suffer.
MB.HPZeroMessage4: The weight of your sin pulls you down — but the earth has yet to claim you fully.
MB.HPZeroMessage5: You stagger beneath the blow; whether you fall to dust or limp on as a husk, only the fates now know.
MB.HPZeroMessage6: The breath rattles, the flesh splits; is this the hour of your breaking, or just another wound to carry?
MB.HPZeroMessage7: The gods avert their eyes; in their silence, weigh your ruin.
MB.HPZeroMessage8: Cracked ribs sing hymns to death, but the final verse may not yet be sung.
MB.HPZeroMessage9: The end gnaws at your edges, but the heart may yet throb with miserable life.
MB.HPZeroMessage10: The wound gapes like a second mouth, and it hungers: for breath, for death, for surrender.
MB.HPZeroMessage11: The hourglass breaks; some grains fall swift, others cling stubborn to the dying light.
MB.HPZeroMessage12: The last breath is a whisper, but the body may yet refuse to yield.
MB.HPZeroMessage13: Your frame shudders on the brink; does the abyss devour you whole, or merely bite deep?
MB.HPZeroMessage14: The hand of violence lays you low; the hand of chance will tell if you rise again, or rot where you fall.
MB.HPZeroMessage15: Your life hangs like a torn banner in a graveyard gale; is this the fall, or only another tattering?
MB.AdventurerDescr: A classless wanderer seeking fortune in dark places. Jack of all trades, master of none.
MB.CursedSkinwalkerDescr: A shapeshifter cursed to walk between forms, carrying ancient tribal knowledge and bestial power.
MB.FangedDeserterDescr: A former soldier turned mercenary, skilled in the art of violence and survival.
MB.GutterbornScumDescr: Born in the filth of society, you've learned to survive by wit and treachery.
MB.HereticalPriestDescr: An outcast from organized religion, wielding forbidden sacred powers.
MB.OccultHerbmasterDescr: A mystic who knows the secret powers of plants and fungi.
MB.WretchedRoyaltyDescr: Once of noble blood, now fallen into darkness and depravity.
MB.EsotericHermitDescr: A recluse who has delved too deep into forbidden knowledge.
MB.SacredSlaughtererDescr: A holy warrior who brings death in the name of forgotten gods.
MB.PaleOneDescr: An albino mystic from deep underground, bearing strange powers.
MB.GoblinGrifterDescr: A cunning goblin con artist who tricks their way through life.
MB.TribalGoblinDescr: A primitive goblin warrior steeped in ancient tribal traditions.
MB.SumpGoblinDescr: A goblin who has adapted to life in the toxic undercity.
MB.TheKwarkDescr: A mysterious goblin entity with strange cosmic powers.
MB.OgreHumongobDescr: A massive goblin-ogre hybrid with incredible strength.
MB.BoneSlavDescr: A warrior eternally bound to serve the skeletal lords.
MB.GodlessSouldoctorDescr: A heretical healer who practices forbidden medicine.
MB.TheSharpCardDescr: A gambler who has made a dark pact for supernatural luck.
MB.TormentedToymakerDescr: A cursed artisan who crafts malevolent playthings.
MB.GlitterbornScumDescr: A festive street urchin touched by holiday magic.
MB.EsotericToymakerDescr: A mystic who infuses toys with eldritch power.
MB.HereticalGnomeDescr: A corrupted garden gnome who has rejected jolliness.
MB.OccultGiftwrapperDescr: A wrapper of presents who binds dark forces in ribbons.
MB.ToothyDesserterDescr: A monstrous candy maker who fled the North Pole.
MB.WretchedSlayerDescr: A hunter dedicated to destroying holiday cheer.
MB.DivineHagDescr: A mystic crone who channels forbidden divine powers through dark rituals.
MB.BlightedMermanDescr: A corrupted sea-dweller who brings curses from the depths.
MB.BloodKnightDescr: A warrior who has forged a pact with ancient powers through blood rituals.
MB.CatacombSaintDescr: A holy figure who dwells in sacred burial grounds, wielding death's power.
MB.DamnedBladeThrallDescr: A cursed warrior eternally bound to serve their mystical blade.
MB.DeathHunterDescr: A tracker who pursues those marked by death itself.
MB.ExaltedGamblerDescr: A holy gambler who plays games of chance with fate and souls.
MB.FanaticPhysicianDescr: A zealous doctor who believes pain and suffering are paths to enlightenment.
MB.FugitiveKnightDescr: A disgraced noble warrior fleeing from a dark past.
MB.GuiltBearerDescr: One who carries the weight of terrible sins, seeking redemption or punishment.
MB.RotgutNecromancerDescr: A debased mystic who communes with the dead through vile substances.
MB.SinEaterDescr: A cursed soul who takes on the sins of others, growing stronger with each burden.
MB.ForlornPhilosopherDescr: A seeker of truth who has lost their way, wandering the world in search of meaning.
MB.SacrilegiousSongbirdDescr: A twisted bard who sings songs of blasphemy and despair.
MB.DeadGod'sProphetDescr: A prophet of a dead god, spreading their dark teachings.
MB.SheddingVicarDescr: A priest who has lost their faith, wandering the world in search of meaning.
MB.HermeticCynanthropeDescr: A reclusive mystic who has turned their back on society, seeking enlightenment in isolation.
MB.Soul-DamnedDrunkardDescr: A cursed alcoholic who has made a pact with dark forces for power.
MB.BetrayedPhantomDescr: A ghostly figure who has been betrayed by their own kind, seeking revenge.
MB.SvampätareDescr: A swamp-dweller who has made a pact with dark forces for power.
MB.THEBellfounderDescr: A master craftsman who has forged a dark pact for power.
MB.BoneSlaveDescr: A cursed warrior bound to serve the skeletal lords.
MB.RottingNecromancerDescr: A necromancer who has made a pact with dark forces for power.
MB.DamnedBlade-ThrallDescr: A cursed warrior bound to serve their mystical blade.
MB.SinfulSailorDescr: A sailor who has made a pact with dark forces for power.
MB.SlappingBastardDescr: A master of the slap, using their skills to survive in a harsh world.
MB.ShonkyShulkerDescr: A shifty merchant who has made a pact with dark forces for power.
MB.CavernousDwellerDescr: A dweller of the deep caverns, seeking power and knowledge.
MB.HalfBreedDescr: A half-breed who has made a pact with dark forces for power.
MB.NachtreuterDescr: A night-dweller who has made a pact with dark forces for power.
MB.MutantRunagateDescr: A mutant who has made a pact with dark forces for power.
MB.OgreHumongobbDescr: A massive goblin-ogre hybrid with incredible strength.
MB.RedCapDescr: A goblin with a red cap, known for their cunning and trickery.
MB.WretchedSleigherDescr: A hunter dedicated to destroying holiday cheer.
